Question & Options:
What book served as the basis for the 2022 movie 'Gangubai Kathiawadi'?
Options:
A. Mafia Queens of Mumbai by Hussain Zaidi
B. The Godfather by Mario Puzo
C. City of Joy by Dominique Lapierre
D. Shantaram by Gregory David Roberts
Correct Answer: Mafia Queens of Mumbai by Hussain Zaidi

In the movie 'Gangubai Kathiawadi' released in 2022, what caused the production to be put on hold in March 2020?
Options:
A. A financial crisis in the film industry
B. A natural disaster affecting the filming location
C. The Indian government's lockdown due to the COVID-19 pandemic
D. A major cast member's sudden illness
Correct Answer: The Indian government's lockdown due to the COVID-19 pandemic
